cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP data port to 0 (invalid port) will cause SCTP socket binding failure, preventing F1-U connection establishment between CU and DU.

du.explanation_en: Setting the local N data port to 0 (invalid port) will cause SCTP socket binding failure, preventing F1-U connection establishment between DU and CU.
du.explanation_zh: 將本地 N 數據端口設定為 0（無效端口）會導致 SCTP 套接字綁定失敗，防止 DU 與 CU 之間建立 F1-U 連接。
